column6: "TRIAL OF THE JUGGERNAUT" pts. 1 & 2 (of 2) Imprisoned and set to face trial, Juggernaut must finally face up to his violent, criminal past. Guest-starring the Avengers' SHE-HULK! 32 PGS.(each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.25 (each)
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | penciller:Ron Garney | penciller (cover):Philip Tan
